title: mahiSAsura mardini mAm
sahitya:
mahiSAsura mardini mAm pAhi madhya dEsha vAsini


caraNam   mahAdEva mAnasOllAsini mAvANi guruguhAdi vEdini mArajanaka pAlini 
sahasradaLa sarasija madhya prakAshini surucira naLini shumbha nishumbhAdi 
bhanjani ihapara bhOga mOkSa pradAyini itihAsa purANAdi vishvAsini gaurahAsini
